The Quranic researcher said to the Almighty: which was not created in the country, an other row for it; That is, they did not create their likeness in the greatness of the boundaries and power in the country of the world, and I heard what was reported from Al -Kawashi, and what was mentioned in it was that one of them was one of them.It came in a hadith that was brought out by the son of Abi Hatim and Ibn Mardwi from Al -Muqdam ibn Ma’ad.It was said: The name of a city is tossed for them.Ibn al -Musayyib and al -Muqabiri said: It is a hardship, and it was said: He warned his people with the endowment, and this is the case that the saying was subjected to the city, and the saying is that it is a hardship where they are not, and they are not.The first, and the verse of the endowment is the last, and the union of their homes is committed.And according to the saying of the name of their debt or the name of their land, it is an added estimation to corrected the consequences; That is, the people of the tumor.It was said: An added is appreciated in the side of the rumor; That is, in a city or with a territorial, it is as long as it is seen.It is forbidden to know about the two times, as you heard, and more than that it is the name of a great city in the land of Yemen and the description of it, and the intended is the same building, the same or the one who is the same or the one who is the same or the one who is the same or the one who is the same or the one who is the same or the same It creates an example of time and a good house and holes in the country of this world, and it is narrated that it was a habit of Lebanon: a hardship and a severe, so I made it a good, then he died of Shadd The world owned and condemned it to him, so he heard the remembrance of paradise, and he said: My son is like it; He built a tumor in some of Sahari, who came in three years, and his age was the age of a year, and it is a great city that is short of gold, silver, silver, and from the hearts, And in it the types of trees and ranted flowers.And when she was built, he walked to her with the people of his kingdom, when he was a path of a day and a night, God sent upon them a sacrifice of the heavens.On the authority of Abd Allah ibn Qalbah, that he came out in the request of a camel for him, and he fell on it, and he carried what he was able to do with him, then he had informed him of his brother As he asked him, he said: It is the same baptism and its entry into it is a man from the Muslims in your time.Then he turned, then Ibn Qalbah visited, so he said: This is God, that man.And the intensity of the masculine told his brother in the weak, but he did not advise his narration as the preservation mentioned by Ibn Hajar, so he is a topic like the news of Ibn Qalbah.It was narrated from Mujahid that the threw of the export is tossed if he is destroyed.And "who" is a description of the same pillar, intended for the city and "How do" In (P-124) Power: “How is your family”, as it was said: Did you not see how your family is your Lord, as usual as the elders of the baptism that did not create the same in the country.Al -Hasan read: “With a return,” with an addition to a tumor, so he is very tossed and the description of us, and that it is a city and the description of the necessity, and it will be for a long time.Ibn al -Zubayr read: “Up the toss” with the addition, but I am tossed with the opening of the hammer and the breaking of the Arabs, it was said: It is a language in the city, not other than.And on the authority of Al -Dahhak, he read: “Usually” is a good and otherwise, “Aram” with the conquest of the hammer and the being of the Arabs to be afraid, and the origin of the arms.And he was read: “Tommary with the same” with an addition to the same.And "who" is a description of the same pillar at the appearance.And on the authority of Ibn Abbas that he read: "Tame" with tension with a past action, with the setting on the verb with it; That is: God Almighty has made the same pillar as a thief, and it will be the most prominent in the sea in terms of action or an evaluation of him, and what is meant by the baptism is upon him, and it is a good one.The appearance is the place of the host.And the joke has a phenomenon, or their city is and make it a thief; That is, its knees are as a result of making them like that.Ibn al -Zubayr read: “He did not create” a building for the acting, and it is his guilt, glory, and the same as the same as the erection on the verbal, and from it also: Great.
